home.title: Cursor Fit
home.subtitle: Manage exercises, create sessions, and run workouts. All data is stored on this device.

quotes.text: I hated every minute of training, but I said, 'Don't quit. Suffer now and live the rest of your life as a champion.'
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.text: The only way to prove that you're a good sport is to lose.
quotes.author: Ernie Banks

quotes.text: Hard work beats talent when talent doesn't work hard.
quotes.author: Tim Notke

quotes.text: The more difficult the victory, the greater the happiness in winning.
quotes.author: Pelé

quotes.text: You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.
quotes.author: Wayne Gretzky

quotes.text: It's not the will to win that matters — everyone has that. It's the will to prepare to win that matters.
quotes.author: Paul 'Bear' Bryant

quotes.text: Do not let what you cannot do interfere with what you can do.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.text: The last three or four reps is what makes the muscle grow. This area of pain divides a champion from someone who is not a champion.
quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.text: Strength does not come from winning. Your struggles develop your strengths.
quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.text: The difference between the impossible and the possible lies in a person's determination.
quotes.author: Tommy Lasorda

quotes.text: Champions keep playing until they get it right.
quotes.author: Billie Jean King

quotes.text: The mind is the limit. As long as the mind can envision the fact that you can do something, you can do it.
quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.text: Pain is temporary. Quitting lasts forever.
quotes.author: Lance Armstrong

quotes.text: If something stands between you and your success, move it. Never be denied.
quotes.author: Dwayne 'The Rock' Johnson

quotes.text: I've failed over and over and over again in my life. And that is why I succeed.
quotes.author: Michael Jordan

quotes.text: The clock is ticking. Are you becoming the person you want to be?
quotes.author: Greg Plitt

quotes.text: Success isn't given. It's earned. On the track, on the field, in the gym. With blood, sweat, and the occasional tear.
quotes.author: Nike

quotes.text: What makes you really come together under pressure is determination and focus and toughness.
quotes.author: Debi Thomas

quotes.text: Set your goals high, and don't stop till you get there.
quotes.author: Bo Jackson

quotes.text: Never give up, never give in, and when the upper hand is ours, may we have the ability to handle the win with the dignity that we absorbed the loss.
quotes.author: Doug Williams

quotes.text: There may be people that have more talent than you, but there's no excuse for anyone to work harder than you do.
quotes.author: Derek Jeter

quotes.text: Age is no barrier. It's a limitation you put on your mind.
quotes.author: Jackie Joyner-Kersee

quotes.text: Today I will do what others won't, so tomorrow I can accomplish what others can't.
quotes.author: Jerry Rice

quotes.text: It ain't over till it's over.
quotes.author: Yogi Berra

quotes.text: If you can believe it, the mind can achieve it.
quotes.author: Ronnie Lott

quotes.text: One man can be a crucial ingredient on a team, but one man cannot make a team.
quotes.author: Kareem Abdul-Jabbar

quotes.text: Make each day your masterpiece.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.text: Without self-discipline, success is impossible, period.
quotes.author: Lou Holtz

quotes.text: Push yourself again and again. Don't give an inch until the final buzzer sounds.
quotes.author: Larry Bird

exercises.title: Exercises
exercises.noExercises: No exercises yet. Add one to get started.
exercises.deleteConfirmMessage: This exercise will be removed. Are you sure?

exerciseForm.levelsLabel: Levels (each level has its own sets)

sessions.title: Sessions
sessions.noSessions: No sessions yet. Create one to run multi-exercise workouts.
sessions.deleteConfirmMessage: This session will be removed. Are you sure?

sessionCreator.noExercisesYet: No exercises yet. Add one below.

workout.quitConfirmMessage: Progress will not be saved. Are you sure?

restTimer.stayOnScreen: Stay on this screen or switch tabs — timer stays accurate

history.title: History
history.clearHistoryMessage: All workout history will be removed. Are you sure?
history.deleteMessage: This workout record will be removed. Are you sure?

settings.title: Settings
settings.clearAllDataMessage: All exercises, sessions, history, and settings will be removed. This cannot be undone.
